Class AdminController

    • AdminDash.AdminController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class AdminController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    class used for the Admin Dashboard

      void clearHolds(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      method to clear all the holds students have on books, originally was going to set a daily checker to clear all holds, but creating this button leaves it up to the discretion of the Admin on when to clear all holds.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
        the initialize method for this application, creates a Timer for constant filtering of the usertable and booktable TableViews in the project. Also creates the dialog box used to present important information to the user as well as running the updateAll function so that the TableViews are all set
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - url
        rb - resource bundle

      • updateFines

        public void updateFines()
        method that updates all of the fines in the SQL login table for the users

      • userPrint

        public void userPrint(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        the print method for the usertable TableView in the Users tab
        Parameters:
        event - button clicked

      • search

        public void search()
        This method searches the SQL login table for cells containing the keyword input by the user in the search textfield. All entries with cells containing the keyword are put in the TableView for the user to see.

      • addUserToSearch

        public void addUserToSearch()
        Increments timercounter by one so that the Timer object created in initializable will run on its next .2 second interval to refresh the userdata table. The private int control is set to 1 so that the Timer will distinguish that the usertable is the table that needs refreshing.

      • removeUser

        public void removeUser(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Removes a user from the SQL login table by ID from the specified textfield.
        Parameters:
        event - button clicked

      • findUser

        public SimpleUserData findUser(java.lang.String id)
        this method searches the login table for a user of the specified ID
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the user being searched for
        Returns:
        a SimpleUserData object that holds information needed

      • changeUser

        public void changeUser(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        this method sets the textfields to the current information of the user being changed so the admin changing the info can determine what they need to change
        Parameters:
        event - button clicked

      • finalizeChange

        public void finalizeChange(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        this method is attached to the finalize button, it updates the SQL login table according to the content of the textfields
        Parameters:

      • stop

        public void stop(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

      • bookPrint

        public void bookPrint(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        the print method for the booktable ViewTable in the Library tab
        Parameters:
        event -

      • bookSearch

        public void bookSearch()
        a method that searches through the SQL library table's cells for entries containing the keyword in the search textfield. The resulting entries with the keyword are then displayed in a TableView.

      • addBookToSearch

        public void addBookToSearch()
        this method increments the timercounter variable by 1. This method occurs every time a character is typed into the search textfield in the library tab. The initializable method creates a Timer that performs a search every .2 seconds if the timercounter variable is incremented. The private int control is also set to -1 so the Timer object can distinguish that the booktable is the one needing refreshing.

      • removeBook

        public void removeBook(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        this method removes a book from the SQL library table by serial.
        Parameters:
        event - button clicked

      • checkout

        public void checkout(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        The checkout method runs checks on the SQL library and login tables to see if the user is able to check out the book, and whether or not the book is available. If all is well, the book is checked out. If the book is on hold, a dialog is displayed asking the user to make sure they wish to override the hold. and if the book is checked out the user cannot checkout the book.
        Parameters:
        event - button clicked

      • checkin

        public void checkin(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        This method is attached to the check in button in the Library tab's Check in/Check out sub-tab, it runs checks to see if the book is available and will check it in for the user specified by ID if the book is currently out. If the book is out but fines are owed an alert box will appear asking for confirmation from the user on clearing the fines
        Parameters:
        e - button clicked

      • userExists

        public boolean userExists(java.lang.String x)
        This method checks the SQL login table to see if a user with the specified ID already exists
        Parameters:
        x - A String parameter representing the ID being checked
        Returns:
        true if user exists

      • bookExists

        public boolean bookExists(java.lang.String x)
        Method checks to see if a book with a serial of x exists in the SQL library table
        Parameters:
        x - the serial of the book being searched for
        Returns:
        returns true if book found

      • usernameExists

        public boolean usernameExists(java.lang.String x)
        This method checks to see if a username already exists, passwords can eb the same for different accounts but this prevents usernames from being the same
        Parameters:
        x - accepts a String parameter, the username being checked
        Returns:
        true if the username exists

      • showTeachSearch

        public void showTeachSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method controls the visibility of the homeroom teacher search in the Quick Reports tab, selecting the button to display overdue students by teacher doesn't actually do the searching, it just toggles the visibility of the real search
        Parameters:
